thread.title: Rob Thomas

author: Rob Thomas
title: Rob Thomas
text:
I am not one to leave reviews normally but I have been really impressed with this company.
I contacted them yesterday afternoon regarding a new tyre & was called back after I made the booking straight away to confirm the order and ensure a time slot could be arranged for the following morning by a really polite individual. This individual talked me through what would happen, giving a time slot as to when they would attend and then confirmed an e mail would follow the next morning confirming the time once again. As advised, an email was there the next morning, giving me a 2 hour slot where they would attend.
The mechanic turned up at the start of the two hour timeframe confirmed & fitted one tyre for me promptly. This mechanic called Nick was really knowledgeable & did a really good job. He confirmed an invoice would be sent by e mail which it has. & he disposed of the old tyre. Since the job was completed this morning, i have also received a confirmation digital worksheet by e mail clarifying the status of the other tyres which they checked confirming the tread.
I am happy to recommend this service and the two individuals I spoke to, both the executive on the phone and the mechanic Nick, were really polite and helpful. This is a really professional service, and one I would definitely use again!
